sub_title: Learning Events Management Coordinator Wells at Shell International B.V.

profile_positions.description: Office coordination Rotterdam office, developing and implementing relevant policies and practiced. Overseeing and managing needs of office in terms of office space, equipment and office supplies. HR Administrative support to HR Manager, preparing contracts, letters and communication. Responsible for onboarding new hires, offboarding leavers, updating personnel files and other employee data changes.
profile_positions.title: Office & HR Coördinator

profile_positions.description:
Team Assistant Technical Planning team NL for 3 team leads and their team of in total around 15 people. Calendar management, booking international travel and visa applications, booking financial expenses, organizing meetings and conferences. 

Technical administrative assistance for SharePoint maintenance, Planning One security user review, technical admin work in Microsoft applications. Technical support in preparing data from Business One and supporting the team with the quarterly reviews and business plan.
profile_positions.title: Team assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for the course administration for around 80 P&T Wells global courses per year
- This admin works consist; acting as the Global LEM for P&T Wells courses, working together with contacts at the local Learning Centers and making sure there is allignment in the Global P&T Wells Learning organisation, working together with the relevant course directors, course facilitators and consultants within the P&T Wells Learning team, monitoring student registrations in Shell Open University, issuing invitation letters, send out Joining Instructions (JI), order of course material, making sure the class set up is according to the requirements, setting up welcome telecon meetings, invigilator for exams and preparing of certificates for exam courses, creating and reporting of surveys after end of courses, administration for student learning statistics of exam courses. Local contact for International Well Control Forum (IWCF) for the mandatory Advanced Well Control examination for students 
- Other activities I am responsible for are; acting as the HSSE focal point for the LEM Rijswijk team; organising Safety Day, informing the team regarding HSSE relevant info, reporting incidents in Fountain and participate in the Rijswijk and Learning Rijswijk HSSE focal point meetings. I am also the focal point for the social events during courses and my role is to make sure that we only use the HSSE approved venues and advising the other colleagues to think about HSSE when they are planning an social event for students.
profile_positions.title: Learning Event Management Coordinator Wells

profile_positions.description:
Personal assistant to VP Manufacturing Europe & Africa (SEG-staff) and working for a team of 20 people 
- Diary / mailbox management for VP Manufacturing Europe & Africa.
- Travel booking for VP Manufacturing Europe & Africa.
- IBVA calendar, add trips and submit once per year.
- On/Off-boarding colleagues that join/leave the department. 
- Support team members to increase efficiency and offloading from administrative tasks.
- Providing administration support to team. Booking travel, processing invoices via SAP TMS, booking of meeting rooms & lunches, printing pre read.
- Keeping overview of process and personal safety incidents for Manufacturing sites in Europe & Africa. Sending out safety report every week. 
- Organize meetings, General Manager F2F meetings 4 times a year. Extended Leadership meeting once a year at Schiphol airport, conferences, and videoconferences. 
- CWT Travel, IT & Livelink Focal point. SERP Super User
- Ordering office and IT (hardware & software) supplies for staff. 
- Updating of distribution lists with adding and removing people.
- Organise team building events, e.g. summer event, New Years dinner.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant VP Downstream Manufacturing

profile_positions.description:
Assistant working for a team of 45 people at the start of Feb 2008. Since January 2010, team assistant for the team of 20 people + personal assistant for the VP HSE Services.
- Diary management for VP HSE Services and Regional Manager NL. Setting up meetings and keeping an eye on time schedules.
- On/Off-boarding colleagues that join/leave the department. 
- Support BSO to increase efficiency and offloading technical staff from administrative tasks.
- Providing administration support to team. Booking travel, processing invoices via SAP TMS, adding and correcting time writing for staff in SERP Timewriting.
- Organize meetings, away-days, conferences, and videoconferences. Take minutes of meetings.
- CWT Travel, IT & Livelink Focal point. SERP Super User
- Training coordinator for HEMP/LOPA and M123 courses. My main tasks where organizing meeting facilities, inviting participants, sending out pre-work and venue information, arranging of invitation letter, organizing lunch, preparing course binders.
- Ordering office and IT (hardware & software) supplies for staff.
- Reports management: Formatting, checking, filing and distribution of GS reports. Ensuring that all reports are filed with the GS Library. GRM filing assistance for team members.
- CSI focal point, my tasks are to add new CSI’s into the analysis sheet, make OFI’s if necessary and provide updates quarterly to Quality focal point.
- Maintain the Global HSE Services teamspace. Updating news, book of faces, etc.
- Informed and trained my team in IP Softphone and Livemeeting 2007. 
- Identified and simplified the distribution lists within HSE Services globally. I have made a plan and reduced the amount of different distribution lists. I have communicated this to the global HSE Services team.
profile_positions.title: Team Assistant HSE Consultancy team

profile_positions.description:
- Developed new procedures for the Long Service Anniversaries (LSA) and Special Recognition Awards (SRA). 
- Designed and implemented a new web form for rewards in nature (SRA-gift), e.g. dinner vouchers.
- Responsible for the administrative support for the LSA and SRA activities in The Netherlands.
- Changed the process and procedures for sending the anniversary gifts. 
- Monthly billing feeders for the long service anniversary gifts. 
- Trained my team in Group Records Management as the GRM-focal point and made a GRM-fileplan for the department.
- Member of the E-filing administration team, responsible for updating E-filing system with new data and providing access to E-filing for employees within HR worldwide and other activities.
-Working with confidential E-files of employees.
- Arranging internal meetings for my team and manager. 
- Maintained distribution list / address list and internal telephone list for HR Services.
profile_positions.title: HR Support Administrator

profile_positions.description:
- Welcoming and escorting new employees, showing them the safety video and giving them access cards to enter the building.
- Importing confidential data of employees into access system ESD.
- Taking photographs for visa and passports for Shell employees.
- Providing administration support to security department.
- Starting up new parking access cards for entrance garage, adding the cards into ESD system and developing a policy for the parking focal points.
profile_positions.title: Receptionist / Administration support

profile_positions.description: Working as an teaching assistant to assist the teachers in their daily work, working with children that needed to improve the Dutch language by teaching them Dutch as a second language. Responsible to assist children 1:1 with maths, Dutch and English lesson to improve their skills so that they can ahead to the next class after the summer break.
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Giving administration support to my colleagues by helping clients.
Verify the cash of the clients and processing these.
Clear old documents from the archive and store documents in the archive.
Other administration activities.
profile_positions.title: Part-time administrator

skills: Good at analysing and solving problems
